title: There was a recent announcement in Star-News from Governor McCrory about plans to establish a direct rail line from Wilmington to Rocky Mount.  Does this mean that rail line from Castle Hayne to Wallace will be re-established or will it be routed a different way?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/news/20160727/new-rail-hub-could-spark-studying-castle-hayne-to-wallace-line
